Text: Is the audio Swedish or english??

Swedish.
But i'm sure there are English subs to find :)

/Captain.
Does anyone know if I can get this film anywhere with English subs? :)

"But i'm sure there are English subs to find :)"

And what if they don't fit the timing due to various cuts?
In such case, you will simply grab different subs instead of whining; most of the world can deal with this "problem" when faced with EN films.
